Translations.Text: He nabi! Apani apanara striderake, kan'yaderake o muminadera nariderake baluna, tara yena tadera cadarera kichu ansa nijedera upara tene deya [1]. Ete taderake cena sahajatara habe phale taderake utyakta kara habe na [2]. Ara allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu

Munaphikara ebam yadera antare byadhi ache ara yara nagare gujaba ratana kare, tara birata na hale amara abasya'i tadera birud'dhe apanake prabala karaba; erapara e nagarite apanara pratibesirupe tara sbalpa samaya'i thakabe
abhisapta haye; taderake yekhane'i pa'oya yabe sekhane'i dhara habe ebam nirdayabhabe hatya kara habe
Age yara atita haye geche tadera byapare eta'i chila allahara riti. Ara apani kakhano allahara ritite kono paribartana pabena na
Lokera apanake kiyamata samparke jijnesa kare. Baluna, 'era jnana sudhu allahara nikata'i ache.' Ara kise apanake janabe, sambhabata kiyamata sighra'i haye yete pare
niscaya allah kaphiraderake karechena abhisapta ebam tadera jan'ya prastuta rekhechena jbalanta aguna
